::Galaxor/Autofire::

Galaxor is hit by several shots, sending him stumbling backwards and
falling over. He lands on his butt, firing a large barrauge of
weaponfire from his various weapons, all at Abominus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Autofire was about halfway across the ocean, and speeding toward the
Dark Avion.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> Speedbreaker starts to lower towards the rest of the Decepticons, 
> letting go of Symphony for safety measures, from 50 feet in the air. 
> He then lands, "Speedbreaker reporting for duty."
> 
> 
> Megatron snarls at Autofire's pull out of the battle. This was a most 
> disapointing result for a plan, but he had anticipated this turn in 
> events. It was time for the Decepticons to move out of the vulnerable 
> position they were in. He remembered the G1 Predacon ship. He stepped 
> out of Astroblast, and looked at his troops. "Astroblast, I hope they 
> are out of the jamming zone, radio Autofire, and tell him to meet me 
> here". He then looked at both the new robots.
> 
> 
> OOC:If so could you repost, also would my teamates mind if I posted 
> for him now?
> 
> Abominus let out a anamalistic growl, and aimed both of his shoulder 
> cannons at Galaxor, still on the ground, and lets loose a burst of 
> power. "Abominus....Cru....Crus.....Destroy", he uttered in a hollow 
> empty voice.
